revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: " [ ];[conveyance of the s]ame property alloy[ ];;[for payments] on productive land on the river bank in the 13th year belonging to Kameliane;;apomoira, drachmas 4, obols 5.5, chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1, obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3, obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5, chalki 2, kollema obol 1, chalki 2, in total drachmas 10, obols 3 chalki 2;;geometria drachmas 6.5, surcharges obols 2.5, in total drachmas 6, obols 4;;conveyance of the property of Louriane in the 13th year, alloy drachmas 10;;tax for the palm trees of the administrative area of Karanis, drachmas 31, surcharges drachmas 2, in total drachmas 33.;Gaius Valerius Serenus cultivator of the 70th cleruchy;;[drachmas 4, obols 20] for conveyance in the 13th year of the property of Maikenatiane, alloy drachmas 6;;in total for the day 118 drachmas, obols 16;;[ ] likewise:;Ischyras, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Ischyrion, mother Thaesis drachmas 12, copper drahmas 8;;Petheus, son of Kanis, grandson of Petheus, mother Tkollainis, copper drachmas 4, ? copper drachmas;;in total for the day drachmas 24, obols 20;;] likewise;Sambous, son of Petheus (Pasion, son of Kalma[.]las);drachmas 36, obols 27 garden tax for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 7, obols 3, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 1.5, naubion obols 4.5, surcharges drachma 1, obols 5, chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2.5, kollema obol 1.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 16, obols 5.5;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 20, obols 3, surcharges drachma 1, obol 1.5, chalki 2, in total drachmas 21, obols 3.5, chalki 2;;Sarapion, son of Sarapion the older, grandson of Papos, mother Thaisas, drachmas 12, copper drachmas: drachmas 4;;Taonnophris, son of Sokmenis . . . (wife of Heron, son of Apollonios);;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 7, obol 1.5, surcharge obols 3;;Heron alias Ammonios, son of Apollonios, grandson of Diodoros, mother Segathis drachmas 4, copper drachmas: drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, son of Petheus, grandson of Pnepheros, mother Taseus, copper drachmas 4 [? copper drachmas];;Arios, son of Sokrates the cultivator of the 45th cleruchy;;taxes on the fertile land of on the river bank for the 13th year at Psenarpsenesis;; Maikenatiane;;(left margin: drachmas 4, obols 23) apomoira drachma 1, obols 5, chalki 2, naubion obol 1, chalki 2, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1, obol 1.5, surcharges obol 0.5, chalki 2, kollema obol 0.5;;? geometria drachmas 2, obols 2, chalki 2, surcharges obol 1;;in total for the day drachmas 88, obols 12."

listBibl.bibl: Pearl OM, Diss, 6-7, 1938 Pearl OM-Youtie HC, PMich IV, 2, 357B, 1939
